doc.description: Vectornav VN200 over uart used as AHRS.

makefile.raw: ifdef SECONDARY_AHRS ifneq (,$(findstring $(SECONDARY_AHRS), vectornav)) # this is the secondary AHRS $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DAHRS_SECONDARY_TYPE_H=\"modules/ahrs/ahrs_vectornav_wrapper.h\" $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DSECONDARY_AHRS=ahrs_vectornav else # this is the primary AHRS $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DAHRS_TYPE_H=\"modules/ahrs/ahrs_vectornav_wrapper.h\" $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DPRIMARY_AHRS=ahrs_vectornav endif else # plain old single AHRS usage $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DAHRS_TYPE_H=\"modules/ahrs/ahrs_vectornav_wrapper.h\" endif
